metadata.title: Various Artists - Through the Mirror: adcBicycle Revisioned [12rec.051]
metadata.creator: Matt Chisholm & others
metadata.description: adcBicycle is Matt Chisholm from Ottawa, Canada. Matt had an EP on Kikapu (RIP) back in 2006 which was on heavy rotation in my player. After finishing his new album one year later, Matt decided not to release it. He got in contact with a bunch of artists he is friends with or fan of, asking them to revisionize his tunes. We are proud to publish this versatile compilation album of boundless and blissful Pop music!
metadata.subject: adcBicycle;Matt Chisholm;12rec;12rec.net;electronic;glitchpop;remix
